translation.en: Sorry, I...
You know how I survive out here?
I don't make noise, and I don't draw attention to myself.
translation.es: No hago ruido y no hago nada para llamar la atención.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
It's called stealth --
try using it before I regret bringing you here.
translation.es: Úsala antes de que me arrepienta de haberte traído.

translation.en: The Autobots ain't paying you for attitude;
translation.es: Los Autobots no te pagan por tu mal genio,

translation.en: we're paying you to find energon.
translation.es: te pagamos para que encuentres energon.

translation.en: I ain't a big fan of dead ends, kid.
translation.es: No me gustan los callejones sin salida, chico.

translation.en: Then you'll be really happy when I activate this hidden hatch, kid.
translation.es: Entonces te alegrarás cuando active esta entrada oculta, chico.

translation.en: Well... polish my tailpipe!
You weren't lying after all.
translation.es: Se ve que no estabas mintiendo.

translation.en: This will keep the Autobots in the fight
translation.es: Con esto los Autobots podrán seguir luchando

translation.en: for a few cycles... at least.
Wait.
This was a Spacebridge?
Oh, yeah! I miss these beautiful beasts.
translation.es: ¡Guau! Cómo extraño a estas bestias maravillosas.

translation.en: You ever go off- world through one?
Mm, yeah. I used to go racing on Velocitron all the time,
translation.es: Sí, solía ir a correr a Velocitron muy seguido,

translation.en: before the Decepticons destroyed 'em all.
translation.es: hasta que los Decepticons los destruyeron.

translation.en: You wanted me to find energon, so I've led you to some energon.
translation.es: Querías que encontrara energon, y te conduje hasta el energon.

translation.en: - We should collect it and go. -
Are you crazy? Those Seekers will be all over us!
translation.es: ¿Estás loco? ¡Los Buscadores se nos vendrán encima!

translation.en: This could change everything.
I have to tell Prime.
I was hired to find energon, not be dragged into an Autobot crusade.
translation.es: Me contrataron para encontrar energon, no para integrar una cruzada Autobot.

translation.en: Is survival a stupid crusade?
I'm trying to survive. Come on!
The Decepticons won't stop, kid.
translation.es: Los Decepticons no se detendrán, chico.

translation.en: At some point, you'll have to choose a side.
translation.es: En algún momento tendrás que elegir un bando.

translation.en: He's right.
Just be careful what side you choose.
translation.es: Pero ten cuidado con qué bando eliges.

translation.en: You seem lost, Autobot.
The Surrender Stations are that way.
translation.es: Las estaciones para rendirse están hacia allá.

translation.en: Unless you'd prefer we surrender you here.
translation.es: A menos que prefieras que hagamos que te rindas aquí mismo.

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Thundercracker, scan them.
Target: unknown.
Target: Wheeljack.
Known collaborator: Optimus Prime, enemy of the state.
translation.es: Colaborador conocido: Optimus Prime. Enemigo del Estado.

translation.en: - - ID: Autobot.
Looters are to be executed on sight,
translation.es: A los saqueadores se los ejecuta en el acto,

translation.en: let alone Autobots.
And as the Commander of the Seekers,
translation.es: Y yo, como comandante de los Buscadores,

translation.en: I decide how they are dealt with.
You fool! They are the enemy!
If the Seekers were under my command,
translation.es: Si yo estuviera a cargo de los Buscadores,

translation.en: you would be dead by my hand.
translation.es: no dudaría en alzar mi mano para matarte.

translation.en: You mean that hand?
The Autobots laugh at us because of him,
translation.es: ¡Los Autobots se nos ríen en la cara por su culpa!

translation.en: and I say we eliminate all three of them.
translation.es: Yo propongo que los eliminemos a los tres.

translation.en: Megatron will reward us for our loyalty.
translation.es: Megatron nos recompensará por nuestra lealtad.

translation.en: So... be it.
- - Go! Now!
You fools! They're getting away!
Uh- oh.
Lord Megatron.
Hail Megatron!
Did two little Autobots do that to you, Starscream?
translation.es: ¿Dos pequeños Autobots te hicieron eso, Starscream?

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Starscream was out of line,
translation.es: Starscream se pasó de la raya,

translation.en: so we had a little chat.
translation.es: así que tuvimos una pequeña charla.

translation.en: Hmm... I see.
We should execute every Autobot on sight!
translation.es: ¡Hay que ejecutar a todos los Autobots en el acto!

translation.en: This war has dragged on long enough!
This war was started as a revolution,
translation.es: Esta guerra comenzó como una revolución,

translation.en: not a genocide.
For a better Cybertron, we must reach their sparks and minds.
translation.es: Para un mejor Cybertron, tenemos que llegar a sus chispas y a sus mentes.

translation.en: Some of us don't want your vision of Cybertron.
translation.es: Algunos no quieren tu visión de Cybertron.

translation.en: You're running low on energon.
You're desperate, taking risks,
and over- extending yourselves.
I don't care what you want.
translation.es: No me importa lo que quieran.

translation.en: However...
I want to see an end to this war as much as you do.
translation.es: quiero que esta guerra termine tanto como ustedes.

translation.en: Denounce the Autobot fanatics and join us.
translation.es: Denuncia a los Autobots fanáticos y únete a nosotros.

translation.en: Help me put a stop to all of this destruction.
translation.es: Ayúdame a ponerle fin a toda esta destrucción.

translation.en: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.es: La libertad es el derecho de todos los seres que sienten.

translation.en: Yes.
The words of your leader...
honorable, but senseless.
Yeah, well...
I'll stick with him.
Such disrespect!
He insults you with the words of Prime.
translation.es: Lo insulta con las palabras de Prime.

translation.en: Starscream, back in line.
You are the great Megatron,
and yet they defy you.
Such trespass cannot be allowed.
translation.es: Ese descaro no se puede permitir.

translation.en: And you...
I'm just trying to survive.
So, a coward then?
translation.es: O sea que eres un cobarde.

translation.en: Afraid to choose a side.
translation.es: Te da miedo elegir un bando.

translation.en: At least this one wears his allegiance
translation.es: Al menos él exhibe su lealtad

translation.en: and his fate with pride.
- Execute them. - Sir?
Starting with the proud Autobot.
With pleasure, Lord Megatron.
translation.es: Será un placer, mi señor Megatron.

translation.en: Seekers, at the ready.
Let them go!
Ah... The noble leader has arrived.
You're in no position to demand anything.
translation.es: No estás en condiciones de exigir nada.

translation.en: Accept my treaty.
And condemn all of Cybertron to slavery.
translation.es: ¿Y condenar a todo Cybertron a la esclavitud?

translation.en: I will not do that, Megatron.
What do you know of slavery,
of the energon mines, or gladiatorial pits?
translation.es: de las minas de energon o de las arenas de gladiadores?

translation.en: My brothers and sisters were pre- determined to suffer
translation.es: Mis hermanos y hermanas estaban predestinados a sufrir,

translation.en: while you and your kind did nothing!
translation.es: ¡y tú y los tuyos no hicieron nada!

translation.en: Everything that you and I have gone through,
translation.es: Todo lo que pasamos tú y yo...

translation.en: we fought for the same things!
What you fight for now, Alpha Trion would be ashamed.
translation.es: Lo que defiendes ahora a Alpha Trion le daría vergüenza.

translation.en: Of us both, I think.
translation.es: Creo que ambos le daríamos vergüenza.

translation.en: I will not accept your treaty.
translation.es: No voy a aceptar tu tratado.

translation.en: Then we end this war here. Now!
translation.es: Entonces le pondremos fin a esta guerra. Aquí. Ahora.

translation.en: I'm enjoying this, Prime.
- - Get to your feet.
Alpha Trion put us all on the path to freedom
translation.es: Alpha Trion nos encaminó a todos hacia la libertad.

translation.en: and, for that, you betrayed him, Megatron.
translation.es: Y por eso lo traicionaste, Megatron.

translation.en: You...
murdered him.
You weren't built for this.
You'll never be able to make the decisions Cybertron needs.
translation.es: Nunca vas a poder tomar las decisiones que Cybertron necesita.

translation.en: Cybertron needs freedom.
Cybertron needs strength...
my strength.
You were always the slower one,
the weaker one.
Seekers, to the air!
Kill her!
Autobots retreat!
- He's not an Autobot. - I'm not an Autobot.
translation.es: - No es un Autobot. - No lo soy.

translation.en: - Go! -
Don't let them escape!
Elita, now!
- Not while you're-- - Now!
Well done, Prime.
Well done.
Hey, uh, Optimus...
before those Decepticons caught us, we discovered something back there.
translation.es: Antes de que los Decepticons nos atraparan, descubrí algo.

translation.en: It will have to wait until we are out of Decepticon territory.
translation.es: Tendrá que esperar hasta que estemos fuera del territorio Decepticon.

translation.en: Who's this?
- - Just an energon scavenger I hired.
translation.es: Un buscador de energon que contraté.

translation.en: He's no Decepticon.
What was that back there?
I had to move in.
Wheeljack only had astro- cycles left--
translation.es: A Wheeljack le quedaban pocos astrociclos.

translation.en: Not that. The explosives.
The idea is to be as far as possible when you blow everything up!
translation.es: ¡La idea es estar lo más lejos posible cuando haces explotar todo!

translation.en: I swear, one day, Optimus Prime, you are going to...
translation.es: Te juro que un día, Optimus Prime, tú vas a...

translation.en: Forget it.
Where's the energon?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el energon? ¿Y qué eres exactamente?

translation.en: - And what exactly are you? - What am I? Don't you mean who?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el energon? ¿Y qué eres exactamente? ¿Qué soy? ¿No querrás decir quién?

translation.en: He's a pain in the ass, that's who he is.
As far as Megatron is concerned, you're an Autobot now.
translation.es: En lo que a Megatron respecta, ahora eres un Autobot.

translation.en: I'll tell you what I told flashy- face over there:
translation.es: Te diré lo que le dije a ojitos rojos hace un rato.

translation.en: I took a job, and the job's done.
translation.es: Acepté un trabajo, y el trabajo está hecho.

translation.en: Pay me, and I'll be on my way.
If the job's done, where's the energon, energon scavenger?
translation.es: Si el trabajo está hecho, ¿dónde está el energon, buscador?

translation.en: I was paid to find it.
translation.es: Me pagaron para encontrarlo. Lo encontré.

translation.en: - I found it. - We will discuss this at headquarters.
translation.es: Me pagaron para encontrarlo. Lo encontré. Lo hablaremos en el cuartel general.

translation.en: - I don't wanna go with you! - You're welcome to go back out there
translation.es: ¡No quiero ir! Eres libre de volver allí afuera

translation.en: and see how hospitable the Decepticons are.
translation.es: y comprobar qué tan hospitalarios son los Decepticons.

translation.en: Good point.
So, this is why you need all that energon.
translation.es: Así que para esto necesitaban tanto energon.

translation.en: Yeah.
Once the energon runs out,
party's over.
Have Red Alert check them out.
translation.es: Dile a Red Alert que los revise.

translation.en: You should all report to medical.
translation.es: Todos deben ir a la unidad médica.

translation.en: - I must speak with Ultra Magnus-- - Optimus...
translation.es: - Tengo que hablar con Ultra Magnus. - Optimus...

translation.en: if anyone should get checked out by a medic, it's you.
translation.es: si alguien necesita un examen médico eres tú.

translation.en: Thank you for your concern, Elita.
Yeah...
well, we can't have our commander getting his brain module caved in.
translation.es: No podemos dejar que el módulo cerebral de nuestro comandante se rompa.

translation.en: - Hey, Optimus, I found the-- - We will speak later, Wheeljack.
translation.es: - Oye, Optimus, encontré el... - Hablamos después, Wheeljack.

translation.en: These hit- and- run missions aren't enough.
translation.es: Con estas misiones relámpago no basta.

translation.en: Until we find more energon, hit- and- run tactics are all we can afford.
translation.es: Sin más energon, las tácticas relámpago son lo único que podemos permitirnos.

translation.en: Cybertron is in ruins.
There may not be more energon.
translation.es: Puede que no haya más energon.

translation.en: I fear...
the war is lost.
Don't you believe that as long as we have sparks inside of us
translation.es: ¿No crees que mientras haya chispas en nuestro interior

translation.en: there is still a chance?
Optimus, at this moment, we must focus on surviving as a race,
translation.es: Optimus, ahora mismo tenemos que concentrarnos en sobrevivir como raza,

translation.en: not winning a war.
There's a reason the Matrix chose you.
translation.es: Por algo te eligió la Matriz.

translation.en: There's no one I respect more than you.
translation.es: No hay nadie que respete más que a ti.

translation.en: But as your military commander, as your friend...
translation.es: Pero como tu comandante militar y tu amigo, te pido...

translation.en: accept the treaty.
I... cannot.
We're facing extinction at the hands of the Decepticons.
translation.es: En manos de los Decepticons corremos peligro de extinción.

translation.en: It is extinction either way.
translation.es: La extinción nos llegará de cualquier manera.

translation.en: You're just as stubborn as Megatron.
translation.es: Eres igual de terco que Megatron.

translation.en: Can you check these two out, Doc?
We all know Wheeljack's beyond my medical capabilities.
translation.es: Todos sabemos que Wheeljack excede mis capacidades médicas.

translation.en: Ha! Funny.
Got something for you, Doc.
Sorry, that was all I could scrounge up.
translation.es: Perdón, es todo lo que pude conseguir.

translation.en: Huh, Thoraxal Nodes?
This will get a few Autobots back in working order.
translation.es: Con esto podremos poner en marcha a algunos Autobots.

translation.en: - Any energon? - No, just those.
And this guy.
Let me look at you.
Looks like you've seen a fair share of action.
translation.es: Se ve que tuviste tu cuota de acción.

translation.en: - What's your name? - Bumblebee.
Mm, pretty rough out there on your own, eh, Bee?
translation.es: Es duro cuando estás allí afuera solo, ¿no, Bee?

translation.en: It was fine until I took this job.
translation.es: Iba bien hasta que tomé este trabajo.

translation.en: How about I help you patch some of this up?
Yeah, sure.
thanks.
Is this all that's left of the Autobots?
It may look bad, but I assure you,
translation.es: Puede que se vea mal, pero te aseguro...

translation.en: it's as bad as it looks.
translation.es: que es tan malo como se ve.

translation.en: I was a doctor before the war,
translation.es: Antes de la guerra era médico,

translation.en: and now, lucky me,
translation.es: y ahora, qué suerte la mía,

translation.en: they gave me a blaster and now I'm a...
translation.es: me dieron un bláster, así que soy un...

translation.en: soldier.
We're all soldiers now.
Bumblebee... is it?
- No. - No?
No, I'm not signing up for your fight!
translation.es: No, no me voy a sumar a tu lucha.

translation.en: - I was not asking you to-- - You were about to.
translation.es: - No te iba a pedir que... - Estabas a punto de hacerlo.

translation.en: - Huh. Am I that obvious? - Kind of.
Look, I appreciate the save back there, but all this…
translation.es: Mira, te agradezco que me hayas salvado, pero esto no es lo mío.

translation.en: this isn't for me.
translation.es: pero esto no es lo mío.

translation.en: This is survival, Bumblebee.
No, it's not!
You're fighting to win,
and that's gonna get you all killed.
translation.es: y eso los va a terminar matando a todos.

translation.en: The Autobots can use someone like you.
translation.es: A los Autobots les vendría bien alguien como tú.

translation.en: I'm no soldier.
Neither were any of us.
The Autobots fight for the day we no longer have to fight.
translation.es: Los Autobots luchan por el día en el que no tengamos que luchar más.

translation.en: Yeah, well, good luck with your crusade.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, suerte con tu cruzada.

translation.en: Let him go.
Prime, he could give our location away.
Maybe I should...
We are not the Decepticons!
Please... let him go.
translation.es: Por favor... dejen que se vaya.

translation.en: Yet again,
the Autobots have escalated this conflict to the point
translation.es: los Autobots han llevado este conflicto al punto

translation.en: where we must answer their aggression with force.
translation.es: en el que tendremos que responder a su agresividad con la fuerza.

translation.en: Under a flag of truce,
Optimus Prime refused my offer of a treaty
translation.es: Optimus Prime rechazó la oferta de mi tratado,

translation.en: and instead tried to assassinate me.
translation.es: y en vez de eso trató de asesinarme.

translation.en: It pains me to say this,
but I realize now that there can be no peace with the Autobots.
translation.es: pero ahora me doy cuenta de que no puede haber paz con los Autobots.

translation.en: I empower you Decepticons and all of Cybertron
translation.es: Autorizo a los Decepticons y a todo Cybertron

translation.en: to bring this painful chapter of our history to a close.
translation.es: a ponerle fin a este doloroso capítulo de nuestra historia.

translation.en: Together, we fight for a lasting unity.
translation.es: Juntos luchamos por una unidad duradera.

translation.en: You wanna lose that hand again?
Lord Megatron,
my Seekers are on the hunt.
translation.es: mis Buscadores salieron a la caza.

translation.en: What's left of the Autobots won't last much longer--
translation.es: Los Autobots que quedan no durarán mucho más.

translation.en: You keep saying that time and time again.
translation.es: Repites lo mismo una y otra vez.

translation.en: If I led the Seekers,
translation.es: Si yo liderara a los Buscadores,

translation.en: I would have already brought you Prime's head!
translation.es: ya le habría traído la cabeza de Prime.

translation.en: If you are not careful, your ambition will be your undoing,
translation.es: Si no tienes cuidado, tu ambición será tu ruina.

translation.en: Starscream.
And his arrogance.
His arrogance, I actually like.
translation.es: De hecho, su arrogancia me gusta.

translation.en: But neither of you will find Prime.
translation.es: Pero ninguno de ustedes encontrará a Prime.

translation.en: Lord Megatron?
Not until you really start to hurt him.
translation.es: No hasta que comiencen a lastimarlo de verdad.

translation.en: We must forge weapons from his weaknesses...
translation.es: Tenemos que forjar armas a partir de sus debilidades:

translation.en: honor... brotherhood...
love.
That's how we'll defeat Prime
and win this war.
